subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Kim Clijsters beat Vera Zvonareva 6-2, 6-1 Saturday night, securing her second straight title at Flushing Meadows in under an hour.
snippet: Kim Clijsters beat Vera Zvonareva 6-2, 6-1 Saturday night, securing her second straight title at Flushing Meadows in under an hour.
